name: Minotaur: The Labyrinths of Crete
overview: Minotaur: The Labyrinths of Crete was one of Bungie's very earliest games developed, and even in 1992 they showed their preference to multiplayer support. In character creation your name, your character appearance, a balance between Brawn, Agility, and Lore skills, and when you want to start slaying with your six friends over AppleTalk. Once in game you will find yourself a member of a treasure-seeking party deep within dark and dangerous mazes. Like any RPG there is an inventory system in which you can find newer items for use and you will need all you can get to survive.
